description: Lamb shoulder is an extremely versatile cut of meat, useful for everything from stews to kebabs Steamed lamb shoulder is wonderfully succulent and tender, well worth the several hours it takes to cook This recipe is inspired by one in Paula Wolfert’s "Couscous and Other Good Food from Morocco," published in 1973.
title: Moroccan Steamed Lamb Shoulder
title_page: Moroccan Steamed Lamb Shoulder Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
Lamb shoulder is an extremely versatile cut of meat, useful for everything from stews to kebabs. Steamed lamb shoulder is wonderfully succulent and tender, well worth the several hours it takes to cook. This recipe is inspired by one in Paula Wolfert’s "Couscous and Other Good Food from Morocco," published in 1973.
Featured in: A Steamed Lamb Shoulder, Moroccan Style.
